about_the_game:
Get ready to dive into a world of whimsy and excitement with Rabbit Rampage, the
captivating game that will have you on the edge of your seat!
Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm where cuddly creatures and vibrant landscapes come
to life. Picture this: a delightful stuffed rabbit named Max was meant to bring joy to a child’s
life. But destiny had a different plan in store. Max accidentally fell into the clutches of the
eccentric and mischievous scientist, Lazar.
Driven by insatiable curiosity and a knack for experimentation, Lazar did the unimaginable.
Max was transformed into an extraordinary plush cyborg, with powers beyond your wildest
dreams. Now, as the Plush Bunny Cyborg, Max is about to embark on an epic adventure
that will leave you breathless!
Equip yourself with an arsenal of high-tech gadgets and harness the incredible cybernetic
enhancements bestowed upon Max. It’s time to take action and defend the vulnerable, while
restoring harmony to this whimsical world. Prepare for heart-pounding missions as you
navigate through enchanting environments, encountering charming companions and facing
off against formidable foes.
Unleash Max's extraordinary abilities to overcome challenges and solve mind-bending
puzzles. Each victory brings you one step closer to discovering the truth behind Lazar
experiments. Join Max on a mission to restore balance and bring justice to this captivating
universe.

THE GAME EVOLVES WITH YOU
As you progress through the game, you can upgrade your character and his weapons.
Depending on the weapon, you can experience a lot of emotions during battles and improve
your combat skills. Using wit and dexterity you can reach unbelievable heights in controlling
the protagonist.

THE BEST EQUIPMENT FOR ADVENTURE
Choose any outfit you want, and it's not just about weapons. As you progress through the
game, you will be able to control a drone, a radio-controlled car and other unusual means of
transport that will become part of the game.

THE BEST EQUIPMENT FOR ADVENTURE
Choose any outfit you want, and it's not just about weapons. As you progress through the
game, you will be able to control a drone, a radio-controlled car and other unusual means of
transport that will become part of the game.

name: Bunny Rampage: History of Revenge

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i3
  • Graphics: Intel HD Graphics
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Win 10
  • Processor: i5
  • Graphics: GTX 1060

short_description: Dive into Rabbit Rampage, a whimsical game where rabbit Max is accidentally transformed into a Plush Bunny Cyborg by eccentric scientist Lazar. Immerse yourself in a fantastical realm as Max embarks on an epic adventure, equipped with high-tech gadgets and cybernetic enhancements
